name: Dios
overview: In 2231 AD, a mysterious creature began to slaughter people on the pioneer planet DIOS. The UN surveillance space force dispatched after that was destroyed in a blink of an eye, and seven volunteers to restore the order of the planet made a name for themselves. A sci-fi action role-playing game in which the player chooses one of the seven warriors and acts. 8-direction multiple high-speed scrolling. There are various stages such as forests, seabeds, and rocky mountains
